forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Cloudy then Slight Chance Rain Showers
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers between 2am and 3am. Cloudy, with a low around 46. Northeast wind 6 to 9 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

forecast.name: Wednesday
forecast.shortForecast: Cloudy then Slight Chance Rain Showers
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers after 3pm. Cloudy, with a high near 52. Northeast wind 9 to 13 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

weather_report:
As the day softly wanes in Boston, a curtain of clouds envelops the skyline, dimming the light that dances off buildings and streets. The air carries a cool chill, with temperatures dipping to a modest 46 degrees, a reminder of the lingering spring. While the evening offers a slight chance of rain, it remains merely a whisper in the breeze—just enough to warrant a light jacket as you venture outside. The northeast wind teases the senses, a gentle companion that encourages you to wrap yourself in warmth as the last rays of sunlight retreat.

Looking ahead to tomorrow, the clouds will remain, cloaking the city in a blanket of gray. The possibility of rain lingers in the air, more an expectation than a certainty, inviting thoughts of cozy pursuits. Whether it's time spent leafing through a favorite book at a quaint café or indulging in the simple pleasure of a long walk wrapped in layers, today's atmosphere propels you toward comfort. Dress in layers to adapt to the chilly temperament of the day, perhaps a soft scarf or a warm beanie to ward off the evening chill. Embrace the subtle beauty of a cloudy day, letting it guide you to find your own quiet moments amidst the bustling streets of this storied city.
